title: The Unexpected Wedding
description: ARE YOU READY TO ENTER THE AMORE?Flynn, a big shot business man, has his sights set on Poppy a small town girl from Alabama. A pact he made with her back in college is all he has ever thought about, and he intends to see it through. Unfortunately when Flynn's fun and games turn into something unexpected will he loose out? Will he lose everything he has to another?Seth is a smart, handsome business man not to mention a total gentleman with a smart mouth and looks to die for. He However has his faults and one hell of a secret. Seth is happy cruising through life but when the woman who holds his secret comes back into town, things take a turn for the worst. Will he be able to break free? Will Seth finally get everything he has ever wanted? Or will Flynn reign supreme?Will Poppy survive the men of the Amore?
author: Gemma Arlington
